name: tunneller
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone that digs a tunnel (= a long passage under or through the ground): Tunnellers have worked under pressure before, but never in such unstable ground conditions. The tunnellers cannot use a machine like the ones used in the Channel tunnel work. See
tunnel
More examplesFewer examplesLand Rovers patrol the site to deter tunnellers burrowing their way in.The tunnellers map the length and direction of the tunnel using satellite pictures.Specialist cavers and tunnellers now have to dig alongside them.
